attributes.action: add Test Match Cricket to the list of protected sporting events that must be freely available to all.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC has decided not to bid for television coverage of Test Cricket, denying many people of limited financial means, such as pensioners, the chance to follow the national team. In light of the BBC decision to broadcast Test Match Special only on Long wave or digital radio, neither of which is necessarily widely available to all, I would urge the Prime Minister to add Test Match Cricket to the list of protected events that currently includes such events as Wimbledon and the FA Cup Final.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
